createtemplate.name: CreateTemplate
createtemplate.description: Grants permission to create a custom template

createworkflow.name: CreateWorkflow
createworkflow.description: Grants permission to create a workflow based on the selected template

createworkflowstep.name: CreateWorkflowStep
createworkflowstep.description: Grants permission to create a step under a workflow and a specific step group

createworkflowstepgroup.name: CreateWorkflowStepGroup
createworkflowstepgroup.description: Grants permission to to create a custom step group for a given workflow

deletetemplate.name: DeleteTemplate
deletetemplate.description: Grants permission to delete a custom template

deleteworkflowstep.name: DeleteWorkflowStep
deleteworkflowstep.description: Grants permission to delete a step from a specific step group under a workflow

deleteworkflowstepgroup.name: DeleteWorkflowStepGroup
deleteworkflowstepgroup.description: Grants permission to delete a step group associated with a workflow

getmessage.name: GetMessage
getmessage.description: Grants permission to the plugin to receive information from the service

gettemplate.name: GetTemplate
gettemplate.description: Grants permission to get retrieve metadata for a Template

gettemplatestep.name: GetTemplateStep
gettemplatestep.description: Grants permission to retrieve details of a step associated with a template and a step group

gettemplatestepgroup.name: GetTemplateStepGroup
gettemplatestepgroup.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata of a step group under a template

getworkflow.name: GetWorkflow
getworkflow.description: Grants permission to retrieve metadata asscociated with a workflow

getworkflowstep.name: GetWorkflowStep
getworkflowstep.description: Grants permission to get details of step associated with a workflow and a step group

getworkflowstepgroup.name: GetWorkflowStepGroup
getworkflowstepgroup.description: Grants permission to get details of a step group associated with a workflow

listplugins.name: ListPlugins
listplugins.description: Grants permission to get a list all registered Plugins

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to get a list of all the tags tied to a resource

listtemplatestepgroups.name: ListTemplateStepGroups
listtemplatestepgroups.description: Grants permission to lists step groups of a template

listtemplatesteps.name: ListTemplateSteps
listtemplatesteps.description: Grants permission to get a list of steps in a step group

listtemplates.name: ListTemplates
listtemplates.description: Grants permission to get a list of all Templates available to customer

listworkflowstepgroups.name: ListWorkflowStepGroups
listworkflowstepgroups.description: Grants permission to get list of step groups associated with a workflow

listworkflowsteps.name: ListWorkflowSteps
listworkflowsteps.description: Grants permission to get a list of steps within  step group associated with a workflow

listworkflows.name: ListWorkflows
listworkflows.description: Grants permission to list all workflows

registerplugin.name: RegisterPlugin
registerplugin.description: Grants permission to register the plugin to receive an ID and to start receiving messages from the service

retryworkflowstep.name: RetryWorkflowStep
retryworkflowstep.description: Grants permission to retry a failed step within a workflow

sendmessage.name: SendMessage
sendmessage.description: Grants permission to the plugin to send information to the service

startworkflow.name: StartWorkflow
startworkflow.description: Grants permission to start a workflow or resume a stopped workflow

stopworkflow.name: StopWorkflow
stopworkflow.description: Grants permission to stop a workflow

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add tags to a resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from a resource

updatetemplate.name: UpdateTemplate
updatetemplate.description: Grants permission to update a custom template

updateworkflow.name: UpdateWorkflow
updateworkflow.description: Grants permission to update the metadata associated with the workflow

updateworkflowstep.name: UpdateWorkflowStep
updateworkflowstep.description: Grants permission to update metadata and status of a custom step within a workflow

updateworkflowstepgroup.name: UpdateWorkflowStepGroup
updateworkflowstepgroup.description: Grants permission to update metadata associated with a step group in a given workflow
